categories: Category:Battles of the Second Imperial Civil War

nodes.text: Mission to Utapau  (Second Imperial Civil War)

The Mission to Utapau was a trap set up by the Hutt leadership to assassinate Sith scientist Vul Isen, who was responsible for the Genocide on Dac and the Devastation of Da Soocha. They hired Cade Skywalker and his team, who were already hunting down Isen, to kill him. Ultimately, Cade was successful in killing Isen.
